replies.author: langyo_v3
replies.txt_content:
我叫坂本 发表于 2017-5-14 16:30
这又是在玩英文？
这不是在玩,人家确实是老外,入驻MCBBS开发一款类似Minecraft的游戏。
请放出最起码的尊重,开发游戏很不容易。
另外,尽量用英语回复这位老外,因为他看不懂汉语,而且他也不习惯对每个回复都使用翻译引擎。实在不行,你可以@我。

[spolier]This thread is dedicated to show the screenshots for CloudLand game.
Detail Thread on MCBBS(including details and downloads):
http://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread- 688951-1-1.html
Please also give some golds and scores on this thread if you like it. ;)
Screenshot Images:[/spolier]

well,many people think you are Chinese

not only talk with others,but also put something useful & exciting here
